title: Did the Cast of ‘Green Acres’ Eat the Pig That Played Arnold Ziffel?
subtitle: Sardonic jokes have circulated about more than one beloved animal star who was allegedly eaten by unsentimental cast and crew members at the end of a shoot.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: At the farewell party thrown after the filming of the final episode Green Acres, the cast and crew barbequed and ate the porcine actor who played Arnold Ziffel.
